title: Pelicans fire Dell Demps; NBA tampering; Defending Matt Kuchar; and Lincoln Riley!
itunes:title: Pelicans fire Dell Demps; NBA tampering; Defending Matt Kuchar; and Lincoln Riley!
description:
Colin Cowherd weighs in on the Pelicans firing Dell Demps and the front office's complete mismanagement of Anthony Davis. The NBA is holding the Lakers to a different standard than other NBA franchises and Colin defends professional golfer Matt Kuchar. Finally, Colin shares his thoughts on Colin Kaepernick settling his dispute with the NFL. Guests include Lincoln Riley, Bill Plaschke, Sam Monson and Ric Bucher!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
